subtitles.text: This is Hanane, a panda. This is Rurun-chan the panda. Hello, I am Rurun-chan the panda. Hello panda.
I'm a panda. What do you do in this panda outfit? Today we will play Othello.
Let's play black and white.
Then, whichever you like. Then, let's go ahead and play black, please.
Cut.
Cool. This time, you know, why am I dressed as a panda? We are a unit station.
We will be doing a song called Mr. Panda. Yay. I'm so happy.
It's an idol song, right? Yes, it is.
And I'm so happy to be able to work with them.

I like Risa-chan's song a lot.
I love it. Karen says she's glad she's an idol too.

I was told that it's okay to be different.
